summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5854 for the improvement of Lake Washington Boulevard South, from Hudson Street to approximately 560 feet south thereof; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77186, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
